DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Prior Oncolytic Virus Therapy Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study that are related to prior targeted therapy that uses viral infection to cause the lysis of tumor cells.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Prior Oncolytic Virus Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._Earlier in time or order._A targeted therapy that uses viral infection to cause the lysis of tumor cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received prior tr
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC) or any other oncolytic virus?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior treatment with talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC), or other herpes virus based therapy?
